segments.text: Do you think what I did to Elvin was out of line ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could have tried to explain to him about the new programmers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Elvin doesn't want any programming help . He wants all the glory for himself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might be right . He does think pretty highly of himself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you hear the names he was calling me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard . But did you have to tear out his nose ring ?
segments.speaker: S2
